item.title: Quickstart: Distributed Key Generation
item.description: Sample Code Find the finalized code for this quickstart on GitHub. Prerequisites A Qrypt Account. Create an account for free. Install CMake. (Optional) Install Visual Studio Code. Setup Clone the repo containing this quickstart to a local folder. Retrieve a token from the Qrypt Portal. (Optional) Create an environment variable QRYPT_TOKEN for it. For simplicity, the commands below will be referencing a QRYPT_TOKEN environment variable but you can also just use the token directly in the commands below.
